DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate MedNav impact ability novice resuscitator perform Neonatal Life Support ( NLS ) simulate environment , ability maintain 7 week period . Testing nul hypothesis difference technical skill completion perform neonatal resuscitation mannequin without MedNav , immediately train period 7 week since training episode .
DOC.brief_title: MedNav : Improving Neonatal Life Support ( NLS )
DOC.detailed_description: Novices resuscitator ( Medical Students ) invite attend 2 hour teach session neonatal resuscitation . To ensure difference outcome Neonatal Life Support ( NLS ) learn attributable MedNav , simple randomisation process carry prior testing , candidate pull folded piece paper assign either 1 . No MedNav perform NLS ( control arm ) 2 . Assistance MedNav perform NLS Blinding/masking possible either candidate faculty test process involve use tablet device display MedNav system . On enter room , candidate state whether use MedNav . Each candidate give identical neonatal resuscitation scenario technical skill neonatal resuscitation assess use 12-point mark sheet adapt Neonatal Life Support course provide UK Resuscitation Council . After test , candidate ask assess confidence perform NLS use seven point Likert scale . Candidates subsequently invite back follow-up session 7 week . Testing NLS scenario undertaken participant stay initial allocation group . Again technical skill assess base UK resuscitation council mark sheet candidate ask rate confidence NLS . For analysis , small sample 9 student `` non-MedNav '' group ask perform NLS use MedNav immediately secondary test 7 week . The investigator aim assess crossover group significant improvement task completion owe largely use MedNav .
DOC.criteria: Imperial Medical student Novice Neonatal resuscitation Medical student with1 year clinical experience . Previous Neonatal training ,
